articles.author: Stuart Murray and Patrick Blannin
articles.title: Diplomacy and the War on Terror
articles.description: By: Stuart Murray and Patrick Blannin It’s an appropriate time to reflect upon the role of diplomacy in the War on Terror through the years of the Bush and Obama administrations.
